dataList.name: The Ring Nursefather's Artwork
dataList.desc: If the main target has 3+ types of negative effects, Final Power +1

dataList.name: Bonebound Knot
dataList.desc:
When Staggered, recover from Stagger next turn and gain 2 [Binding]
Every subsequent Turn Start: gain 2 [Vulnerable] and 1 [Enhancement]
